另外見到個comment:

Battery life is only about 1 hour with ECO mode turn on and just surfing the net. Which make it not even portable and cant leave the AC charger. I have contacted MSI support center and they said it is normal with about 2 hour battery life for these model with all the unused function (WIFI, Bluetooth. ..etc) turned off and only watching movie .
- the original 128 GB SSD is slow and the storage size is definitely not enough, you will need a upgrade.
- the fan is noisy with playing games.

我唔識電腦 加ram其實係點

replies.msg:
1. Check左部機有幾多Ram槽(slot)先，佢得一個槽位，咁你想要幾大既Ram就買幾大，1換1，但上面寫有2 slots

2. 有兩個就睇你對dual channel 有冇愛，有就要買返條同一容量，同一速度，最好同牌子，如冇就唔同容量都得，但都要同一速度(唔係就會行慢d果條既速度，但都要底板支援個速度)，以上面為例，就買返8GB 2400 DDR4 牌子問返MSI，佢地會答

0 上網搵下有冇片教你拆機背加ram先，冇又或者太難度高，都係唔好自己亂黎，睇下可唔可以叫原廠幫加
